    Climbing

    Outside of work I enjoy to go climbing and bouldering. Below are a few pictures of boulder problems or routes I enjoyed. Most of my ascents are logged on theCrag.

    Blindfisch fb. 7b, Averstal.

    Zilliman fb. 7a, Averstal.

    Hopper fb. 6c+, Chironico.

    Bea on Barbarella fb. 6c+, Averstal.

    Rock Republic, 7b, Geyikbayiri.
